title: Creamy Chicken & Broccoli Casserole
directions: Mix cream cheese spread, 2 Tbsp. milk and garlic powder in large bowl until blended. Add chicken, broccoli, shredded cheese and remaining milk; mix well. Spoon into 13x9-inch baking dish sprayed with cooking spray; cover.
Bake 25 min. Meanwhile, mix cracker crumbs and butter.
Stir chicken mixture; top with crumbs. Bake, uncovered, 10 min. or until chicken mixture is heated through and crumb topping is golden brown.
ingredients: 1 tub (8 oz.) PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese Spread
1-1/2 lb. boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
1 pkg. (14 oz.) frozen broccoli florets, thawed, drained
1-1/2 cups KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese
